author: jih2nn
content:
I've opened a PR that modifies Prysm to emit IL events [1] and Dora to display ILs per slot [2]. Please review it when you have some time <@363800010518822915> <@808969530608451584> 
[1] https://github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/pull/15033
[2] https://github.com/ethpandaops/dora/pull/272

You can try this out with this Kurtosis config: https://github.com/jihoonsong/local-devnet-focil/blob/main/kurtosis/kurtosis.config.registry.yaml

author: sibkatya
content: For my setup prysm crashes when I use `seconds_per_slot: 6`. The same with PeerDAS config. I commented it and dora image and it now it's working
